Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientMessageHandler, Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection extends Object implements ClientMessageHandler, Runnable
This class manage the client's socket.
